thread.title: IoIs for Alberta 10yr over USD1bn, talk unchanged

title: IoIs for Alberta 10yr over USD1bn, talk unchanged
text: March 8, 2018 / 8:16 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago IoIs for Alberta 10yr over USD1bn, talk unchanged LONDON, March 8 (IFR) - * IoIs USD1bn+. Guidance MS+47 area. Pricing today. (8:11am) * IPTs MS+47 area, benchmark size, tbp Thursday. Due 15 Mar 2028, pay 15 Mar, 5k/1k denoms. (March 7) Province of Alberta (ALTA), rated Aa1/A+ (neg/st), has mandated BAML, BMO, CIBC and TD for a 10yr SEC registered US dollar benchmark transaction. Target market: Professional & Eligible Counterparties (all distribution channels). The banks will be paid a fee by the issuer in respect of the placement of the securities. (March 7)
